entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
